Today we bid goodbye to one of the greatest leaders of our time and the best boss I could have asked for.
President Mwai Kibaki supported transformative projects such as MPESA, Open Data, Internet etc. Your foresight rewarded this country greatly.
Rest in eternal peace. https://t.co/95Q4Waf1op
